betterquesting:10.desc:8:
You've crafted the Crucible, now you need to understand spellwaves! 

Unlike TC4, TC6 elements that exist in the Crucible for a long time do not break down into secondary elements, and all source matter in the Crucible is turned into spellwaves and volatilized into the aura field when you leave it untouched for a certain amount of time. 

And instead of being fluid (spellwave slime and spellwave gas), the spellwaves are dispersed directly into the aura field, slowing down the recovery of the aura, and too many spellwaves can lead to the creation of §5 Rift§f§r and §5 Corruption§f§r, which will be explained in an upcoming chapter.
